a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Shown is the female employment-to-population ratio in 2020 (horizontal axis) and in 1980 (vertical axis). The
female employment-to-population ratio corresponds to the proportion of a country's female population 15+ that is
employed. All figures correspond to national estimates, without ILO corrections (see limitations and exceptions in
Female employment-to-population ratio (%) in 1980 (% national estimate)
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
